name: AdshiftSDK
summary: AdShift iOS SDK - Mobile Attribution & Analytics
description:
AdShift SDK enables mobile attribution, in-app event tracking,
SKAdNetwork 4.0+ integration, deep linking, and GDPR/TCF 2.2
compliance for iOS apps.
